paragraphs.title: Onur Kaplan
paragraphs.text:
val df = spark.read.format("csv").option("header", "true").option("inferSchema", "true").load("C:/Users/Onur/Desktop/players_stats.csv")
df.toDF().registerTempTable("table")

paragraphs.title: Activity3
paragraphs.text:
%md
Dataset URL: https://www.kaggle.com/drgilermo/nba-players-stats-20142015

paragraphs.title: Problem 1 : The length of time players play according to their age
paragraphs.text:
%sql 
SELECT Age,AVG(Min) FROM Table GROUP BY Age ORDER BY Age ASC

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Problem 2: Ranking of the score per minute by point guard (PG) role
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT TEAM,AVG(Pts) FROM Table WHERE Pos = 'PG' GROUP BY Team ORDER BY Team ASC

paragraphs.title: Activity5
paragraphs.text:
%md
Activity5_1 : Regression
Dataset URL: https://www.kaggle.com/drgilermo/nba-players-stats-20142015

paragraphs.title: REGRESSION
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession
import org.apache.spark.SparkContext
import org.apache.spark.ml.regression.LinearRegression
import org.apache.spark.ml.feature.Interaction
import org.apache.spark.ml.feature.VectorAssembler
import org.apache.spark.ml.feature.Normalizer
import org.apache.spark.mllib.stat.Statistics
import org.apache.spark.ml.stat.Correlation
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row
import org.apache.spark.ml.feature.VectorAssembler
import org.apache.spark.ml.regression.{RandomForestRegressionModel, RandomForestRegressor}
import org.apache.spark.ml.Pipeline
import org.apache.spark.ml.evaluation.RegressionEvaluator
import org.apache.spark.ml.classification.NaiveBayes
import org.apache.spark.ml.evaluation.MulticlassClassificationEvaluator


val data_R = spark.read.format("csv").option("header", "true").option("inferSchema", "true").load("C:/Users/Onur/Desktop/players_stats.csv")
data_R.toDF()
data_R.show()

val data_R_Son = data_R.select(data.columns.slice(1, 24).map(col(_)):_*)
data_R_Son.show

var regression = new VectorAssembler()
    .setInputCols(Array("Games Played","MIN","FGM","FGA","FG%","3PM","3PA","3P%","FTM","FTA","FT%","OREB","DREB","REB","AST","STL","BLK","TOV","PF","EFF","AST/TOV","STL/TOV"))
    .setOutputCol("features")
.transform(data_R_Son)

regression.show()

paragraphs.title: LinearRegression
paragraphs.text:
val Array(train_R, test_R) = regression.randomSplit(Array(0.8, 0.2))

val lr = new LinearRegression()
  .setLabelCol("PTS")
  .setFeaturesCol("features")
  .setMaxIter(100)
  .setRegParam(1.0)
  .setElasticNetParam(1.0)

msg.data:
train_R: org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset[org.apache.spark.sql.Row] = [Games Played: int, MIN: int ... 22 more fields]
test_R: org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset[org.apache.spark.sql.Row] = [Games Played: int, MIN: int ... 22 more fields]
lr: org.apache.spark.ml.regression.LinearRegression = linReg_63cd85f824af

paragraphs.title: LinearRegression Correlation Matrix,R2 Score and RMSE
paragraphs.text:
val trainingSummary = model_lr.summary
println(s"numIterations LinearRegression : ${trainingSummary.totalIterations}")
println(s"RMSE LinearRegression : ${trainingSummary.rootMeanSquaredError}")
println(s"r2 LinearRegression : ${trainingSummary.r2}")

var corr = new VectorAssembler()
    .setInputCols(Array("Games Played","PTS","MIN","FGM","FGA","FG%","3PM","3PA","3P%","FTM","FTA","FT%","OREB","DREB","REB","AST","STL","BLK","TOV","PF","EFF","AST/TOV","STL/TOV"))
    .setOutputCol("features")
.transform(data_R_Son)

val correlation_matrix = Correlation.corr(corr, "features").head
println("Pearson Correlation Matrix:\n" + correlation_matrix.toString)

paragraphs.title: RandomForestRegressor
paragraphs.text:
val rf = new RandomForestRegressor()
  .setLabelCol("PTS")
  .setFeaturesCol("features")
  
val model_rf = rf.fit(train_R)
val predictions_rf = model_rf.transform(test_R)

msg.data:
rf: org.apache.spark.ml.regression.RandomForestRegressor = rfr_47bc5edd38d3
model_rf: org.apache.spark.ml.regression.RandomForestRegressionModel = RandomForestRegressionModel (uid=rfr_47bc5edd38d3) with 20 trees
predictions_rf: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [Games Played: int, MIN: int ... 23 more fields]

paragraphs.title: RandomForestRegressor RMSE and R2 Score
paragraphs.text:
val evaluator_R_rmse = new RegressionEvaluator()
  .setLabelCol("PTS")
  .setPredictionCol("prediction")
  .setMetricName("rmse")
val rmse = evaluator_R_rmse.evaluate(predictions_rf)

val evaluator_R_r2 = new RegressionEvaluator()
  .setLabelCol("PTS")
  .setPredictionCol("prediction")
  .setMetricName("r2")
  
val r2 = evaluator_R_r2.evaluate(predictions_rf)

paragraphs.title: Activity5_2
paragraphs.text:
%md
Activity5_2 : Classification
Dataset URL: https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Cryotherapy+Dataset+

paragraphs.title: CLASSIFICATION
paragraphs.text:
val data_C = spark.read.format("csv").option("header", "true").option("inferSchema", "true").load("C:/Users/Onur/Desktop/Cryotherapy.csv")
data_C.toDF()
data_C.show()

var classification = new VectorAssembler()
    .setInputCols(Array("sex","age","Time","Number_of_Warts","Type","Area","Result_of_Treatment"))
    .setOutputCol("features")
.transform(data_C)

classification.show()

paragraphs.title: Naive Bayes
paragraphs.text:
val Array(train_C, test_C) = classification.randomSplit(Array(0.8, 0.2), seed = 1234L)

val gnb = new NaiveBayes()
  .setLabelCol("Result_of_Treatment")
  .setFeaturesCol("features")

val model_gnb = gnb.fit(train_C)

val predictions_gnb = model_gnb.transform(test_C)
predictions_gnb.show()

paragraphs.title: Naive Bayes Accuracy
paragraphs.text:
val evaluator_C_acc = new MulticlassClassificationEvaluator()
  .setLabelCol("Result_of_Treatment")
  .setPredictionCol("prediction")
  .setMetricName("accuracy")
val accuracy_gnb = evaluator_C_acc.evaluate(predictions_gnb)

paragraphs.title: Activity5_3
paragraphs.text:
%md
Activity5_3 : Clustering
Dataset URL: https://www.kaggle.com/oliversinn/fifa-18-visualisation-clustering-ml/data

paragraphs.title: CLUSTERING
paragraphs.text:
val data_Cluster = spark.read.format("csv").option("header", "true").option("inferSchema", "true").load("C:/Users/Onur/Desktop/PlayerPlayingPositionData.csv")
data_Cluster.toDF()
data_Cluster.show()

var cluster = new VectorAssembler()
    .setInputCols(Array("CAM", "CB", "CDM", "CF","CM","ID","LAM","LB","LCB","LCM","LDM","LF","LM","LS","LW","LWB","RAM","RB","RCB","RCM","RDM","RF","RM","RS","RW","RWB","ST"))
    .setOutputCol("features")
.transform(data_Cluster)

cluster.show()

paragraphs.title: Kmeans WSSE and Cluster Center
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.clustering.KMeans

val kmeans = new KMeans().setK(5).setSeed(1L).setFeaturesCol("features")
val model_kmeans = kmeans.fit(cluster)

val WSSE = model_kmeans.computeCost(cluster)
println(s"WSSE = $WSSE")

println("Cluster Centers: ")
model_kmeans.clusterCenters.foreach(println)
